evidence.claim: Automated Healthcare Solutions utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing capabilities.
The company employs FHIR standards to facilitate interoperability in healthcare data exchange.
Automated Healthcare Solutions manages EDI transactions, including X12 270 and 271, for eligibility checks.
They leverage Azure services for their database management needs.
HL7 standards are applied in their data integration processes across healthcare systems.

icp.icp_reason: They utilize X12 formats and API automation in healthcare data exchange.
matched_use_cases: clearinghouse services for providers and payers
